page.title: 08EDUCATION 3
page.content: {Talking to a school governor { }Most children in our class did not know what a School Governor did. Since every school in the country has govenors we invited one of ours into the class. We had some information he told us that a school govenor has lots of jobs. One is apointing staff and help the headmaster like all other governors. He is the eyes and ears around the village,and if hears any complaints or comments he tells the headmaster.He also discuses the schools future and past with the headmaster. He enjoys just popping into see the children and staff.
